title: Riot needs to delete Ezreal.
body:
Blue Ezreal should not be a thing NOR should it have ever been a thing.

I had a crap one on my last game and I wish for you not to suffer from it's PTSD either.

Even I was duped by it in the past:
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3564120
